hero.subtitle: High-performance river infrastructure connecting Belém and Manaus. Executive standard in cargo and passenger transport.

world_section.description: Sail through routes that reveal the soul of the Amazon. From historic ports to untouched landscapes, we connect you to the region's most fascinating destinations.
world_section.divider: Connecting the extremes of the Amazon, every day, in every direction.

booking.unavailable: Route unavailable for automatic selection. Please contact us for manual analysis.
booking.helper_text: Select the complete route to check times and values

fleet.description: Authority fleet composed of industrial vessels, designed for total stability and maximum logistical efficiency in the Amazon.

rondonia.desc: The giant of the Amazon basin. Double hull for absolute stability and maximum capacity for industrial logistics.

amazon.desc: Speed and sophistication. The most exclusive panoramic deck in the region, ideal for executive travel.

suite_master.name: Master Suite
suite_master.desc: Box Bed, High-Standard Private Bathroom, Climate Control and Minibar.

camarote.name: Executive Cabin
camarote.desc: 4 Premium Accommodations, Air conditioning and Privacy for your team or family.

salao.name: Business Lounge
salao.desc: Reclining seats in a climate-controlled and monitored environment.

redario.name: Traditional Hammock Area
redario.desc: Authentic experience on the upper deck with natural ventilation.

footer.description: Absolute reference in logistics sovereignty in the Amazon. Naval engineering dedicated to efficiency and regional progress.
